page.title: 04125th BIRTHDAY CELEBRATIONS
page.content: On the{5th July 1985}we all came to school dressed in{Victorian clothes. {The headteacher,Mr Jolly,}lined us up in a line,boys in one line, girls in another.When we got in to the class we sat in our two seater desks. Mr Jolly called the register we lined up and walked down to assembly where we all received a certificate to say we were here when the school was{125 {years old}.After the assembly we stood outside the old building for photographs to be taken. We returned to class.We had lessons with Father Robin and PC Mitchell, after that we were given copy books for our writing. Then we did some subtraction.We had broth for lunch.Later we found out that the parents had layed on a tea for us,and we received a leather bookmark and then went home having enjoyed our day.
